mapper.insert: insert into inquiry(inquiry_idx, id, inq_title, inq_content, inq_date, inq_state) values(inquiry_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{inq_title}, #{inq_content},sysdate, '답변 대기')
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum r_num, a.* from (select * from inquiry order by inquiry_idx desc) a) where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}
